title: （篤灰）請舉報警察 Line 號碼

replies.msg:
https://news.mingpao.com/ins/%E6%B8%AF%E8%81%9E/article/20191008/s00001/1570524858985/%E3%80%90%E9%80%83%E7%8A%AF%E6%A2%9D%E4%BE%8B%E3%80%91%E8%AD%A6%E5%AF%9F%E5%A0%B1%E6%96%99%E7%86%B1%E7%B7%9A%E3%80%8C%E7%BF%BB%E7%94%9F%E3%80%8D-%E5%A2%9Ewechat-line%E7%84%A1whatsapp
警方今午（8日）再召開記者會，交代反修訂《逃犯條例》行動情況。資訊系統部高級警司陳志勇公布，警方重設「反暴力報料熱線」，新增電話號碼、電郵、WeChat及Line平台接受市民報料；但早前推出4日即被全數移除的WhatsApp報料熱線，陳志勇稱因WhatsApp公司不同意警方使用該平台，故今次無用該平台設立報料熱線。

新增報料熱線電話為5333 3103；WeChat ID為HKPF53333103；Line ID為hkpf53333103；電郵為hotline@police.gov.hk。警方表示，有關平台將不會使用自動化回覆，亦非用作報案平台，市民若需報案，應到就近警署或致電999。

_________________________________________________

各位快啲發送以下訊息去 Line 公司，disable 埋佢 ！！！

投訴網頁: https://contact-cc.line.me/en/
下載並上傳以下 PDF 信息 並 投寄。
PDF version of text below: https://www.asuswebstorage.com/navigate/a/#/s/4010CE26D3564CAFA4E1C3C3492570204

______________________________

Dear LINE,
I am writing to complain that this user account: "hkpf53333103", is suspected in contravening your Terms and Conditions. Namely, 12.8. - "Activities that use the Service for sales, marketing, advertisement, soliciting or other commercial purposes(except for those approved by the Company);use the Service for the purpose of sexual conducts or obscene acts.use the Service for the purpose of meeting a person for sexual encounters.use the Service for the purpose of harassment or libelous attacks against other Users;or use the Service for purposes other than the Service's true intent."

Please kindly investigate and take down this user if appropriate. Thank you.
